amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to increase the amount withheld from Office of the Secretary and for executive management for operations and support from $25 million to $35 million if they do not submit the certain required reports.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
